item.title: Things to know about the release of federal documents related to MLK’s assassination
item.description: Federal records related to the investigation into the assassination of the Rev. Martin Luther King Jr. have been released.

item.title: OpenAI and Google outdo the mathletes, but not each other
item.description: OpenAI and Google's AI models achieved impressive results in a difficult math competition, but disputed how the other got their score.

item.title: Tesla’s retro-futuristic diner officially opens as Elon Musk hints at more locations
item.description: The Tesla Diner & Drive-In officially opened Monday and it seems Elon Musk is planning for more.

item.title: Military bases in New Jersey, Indiana, to be expanded to detain immigrants
item.description: NPR has learned that the Pentagon has also approved the expansion of the U.S. Naval Base on Guantanamo Bay, Cuba, for the same purpose.
